item.description:
The Basic Doubles Skills Clinic is the first in a series of free Boston Volleyball Meetup doubles clinics for beginners through advanced players. This is your chance to learn doubles!

The Basic Doubles Skills Clinic is designed for players who have played some form of organized volleyball but are relatively new to the doubles scene. We assume that you are already able to serve a ball inbounds at least 75% of the time. We focus only on the basic skills listed below. After practicing these basic skills, you should be able to compete well at B level in local doubles tournaments.

The other clinics in this series cover the Low Intermediate through Advanced skills.

The format of clinics are 65% drills, 20% instruction, and 15% scrimmage. Each clinic is two hours long. We run these outdoors on good-weather days only.

Coach Matt has been playing doubles for 20 years. He competes at AA level. He has learned volleyball coaching in the HITS and FullSpeed programs. Matt co-runs Meetup QK Doubles Tournaments with Brian Lee.

These clinics have limited spots available but will be offered on other dates. Please sign up as an individual. If you wish to bring a guest, please have them register in meetup and sign themselves up. It is free. Even if the event is full, feel free to sign up on the wait list, as there is some chance you'll get in. Also, I will email early notice to those waitlisted here when this clinic is offered again, sometime soon. If you need to cancel, please do so at least 18 hours in advance.

Please arrive at noon or 15 minutes early. It is optional but would be appreciated if you show up 30 minutes early to help coach set up nets.

A net will be provided to you for beginner-intermediate practice/play after the clinic ends at 2PM.

What you should bring:

• Outdoor shoes with nubby tread.

• Your outdoor volleyball. We prefer Spaulding King of the Beach or Wilson Official AVP. Please do not bring indoor volleyballs. Coach will bring extra volleyballs but they will be old.

• Water. There is no source of water near the site.


SKILLS LIST

Basic Skills (B level)

1. Serving

2. Body Position and Footwork

3. Bump Passing

4. Bump Setting

5. Roll Shot

 

Low Intermediate (BB level)

1. Overhand Digging

2. Poking

3. Cut Roll Shot

4. Three-meter hitting (mainly for men).

 

Intermediate Skills (A level)

1. Reading

2. Diving

3. Overhand Setting

4. Downward Spiking

 

Advanced Skills (AA level)

1. Blocking

2. Jump Serving

3. Beach Digging

4. Tooling
item.how_to_find_us: Between Soldiers Field Road and the River, near the kayak rental hut.b Parking is free.
item.name: Basic Volleyball Doubles Skills Clinic
